changeArbitrator(address,bytes).details: Changes the arbitrator of the contract.

params._arbitratorExtraData: The extra data used by the new arbitrator.

changeExecutionTimeout(uint256).details: Changes the time allocated for list's execution.

params._executionTimeout: The new duration of the execution timeout, in seconds.

changeLoserMultiplier(uint256).details: Changes the proportion of appeal fees that must be added to appeal cost for the losing party.

params._loserMultiplier: The new loser multiplier value in basis points.

changeMetaEvidence(string).details: Update the meta evidence used for disputes.

params._metaEvidence: URI to the new meta evidence file.

changeSharedMultiplier(uint256).details: Changes the proportion of appeal fees that must be added to appeal cost when there is no winner or loser.

params._sharedMultiplier: The new shared multiplier value in basis points.

changeSubmissionDeposit(uint256).details: Changes the value of the base deposit required for submitting a list.

params._submissionBaseDeposit: The new value of the base deposit, in wei.

changeSubmissionTimeout(uint256).details: Changes the time allocated for submission.

params._submissionTimeout: The new duration of the submission period, in seconds.

changeWinnerMultiplier(uint256).details: Changes the proportion of appeal fees that must be added to appeal cost for the winning party.

params._winnerMultiplier: The new winner multiplier value in basis points.

changeWithdrawTimeout(uint256).details: Changes list withdrawal timeout. Note that withdrawals are only possible in the first half of the submission period.

params._withdrawTimeout: The new duration of withdraw period, in seconds.

executeSubmissions().details: Approves a transaction list or creates a dispute if more than one list was submitted. TRUSTED. If nothing was submitted changes session.

executeTransactionList(uint256,uint256,u.details: Executes selected transactions of the list. UNTRUSTED.

params._count: Number of transactions to execute. Executes until the end if set to "0" or number higher than number of transactions in the list.
params._cursor: Index of the transaction from which to start executing.
params._listID: The index of the transaction list in the array of lists.

fundAppeal(uint256).details: Takes up to the total amount required to fund a side of an appeal. Reimburses the rest. Creates an appeal if at least two lists are funded. TRUSTED.

params._submissionID: Submission's index in the array of submitted lists of the current sesssion. Note that submissionID can be swapped with an ID of a withdrawn list in submission period.

getContributions(uint256,uint256,address.details: Gets the contributions made by a party for a given round of a session. Note that this function is O(n), where n is the number of submissions in the session. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should only be used for interface display and not by other contracts.

getCurrentSessionNumber().details: Gets the number of the ongoing session.
getCurrentSessionNumber().return: The number of the ongoing session.

getExpendableFunds().details: Gets the sum of contract funds that are used for the execution of transactions.

getNumberOfCreatedLists().details: Gets the number of lists created in contract's lifetime.

getNumberOfTransactions(uint256).details: Gets the number of transactions in the list.

params._listID: The index of the transaction list in the array of lists.

getNumberOfTransactions(uint256).return: txCount The number of transactions in the list.

getRoundInfo(uint256,uint256).details: Gets the information on a round of a session. Note that this function is O(n), where n is the number of submissions in the session. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should only be used for interface display and not by other contracts.

getSessionRoundsNumber(uint256).details: Gets the number rounds in ongoing session.
getSessionRoundsNumber(uint256).return: The number of rounds in session.

getSubmittedLists(uint256).details: Gets the array of submitted lists in the session. Note that this function is O(n), where n is the number of submissions in the session. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should only be used for interface display and not by other contracts.
getSubmittedLists(uint256).return: submittedLists Indexes of lists that were submitted during the session.

getTransactionInfo(uint256,uint256).details: Gets the info of the specified transaction in the specified list.

params._listID: The index of the transaction list in the array of lists.

rule(uint256,uint256).details: Gives a ruling for a dispute. Must be called by the arbitrator. The purpose of this function is to ensure that the address calling it has the right to rule on the contract.

params._disputeID: ID of the dispute in the Arbitrator contract.
params._ruling: Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for "Refuse to arbitrate".

setMetaEvidence(string).details: Sets the meta evidence. Can only be called once. Convenience function that removes the need to precompute the deployed contract address for the metaevidence data.

params._metaEvidence: The URI of the meta evidence file.

submitEvidence(string).details: Allows to submit evidence for a current session.

submitList(address[],uint256[],bytes,uin.details: Creates transaction list based on input parameters and submits it for potential approval and execution. Transactions must be ordered by their hash.

params._data: Concatenated calldata of all transactions of this list.
params._dataSize: List of lengths in bytes required to split calldata for its respective targets.
params._description: String in CSV format that describes list's transactions.
params._value: List of values required for respective addresses.

withdrawFeesAndRewards(address,uint256,u.details: Sends the fee stake rewards and reimbursements proportional to the contributions made to the winner of a dispute. Reimburses contributions if there is no winner.

params._beneficiary: The address that made contributions to a request.
params._round: The round from which to withdraw.
params._session: The session from which to withdraw.
params._submissionID: Submission's index in the array of submitted lists of the session which the beneficiary contributed to.

withdrawTransactionList(uint256,bytes32).details: Withdraws submitted transaction list. Reimburses submission deposit. Withdrawal is only possible during the first half of the submission period and during withdrawTimeout seconds after the submission is made.

params._submissionID: Submission's index in the array of submitted lists of the current sesssion.

devdoc.title: KlerosGovernor Note that this contract trusts that the Arbitrator is honest and will not re-enter or modify its costs during a call. Also note that tx.origin should not matter in contracts called by the governor.
